sent.orig: Otherwise, if either operand is of type long, the other is converted to long.
sent.trans: 否则，如果一个操作数为long类型的，那么另外一个被转换成long类型的。

sent.orig: Purpose To study the clinicopathological features,histogenesis and differential diagnosis of adamantinoma of long bone(ALB).
sent.trans: 目的探讨长骨造釉细胞瘤(adamantinoma of long bone,ALB)的临床病理特征、诊断和鉴别诊断及其组织发生。

sent.orig: Mr Long will be merged company's chief executive and Mr Frenzel will take over as chairman.
sent.trans: Long先生将出任新公司的首席执行官Frenzel先生担任董事长。

sent.orig: Functions that return counts usually return a LONG or DWORD.
sent.trans: 函数返回计数通常返回LONG或DWORD类型。

sent.orig: I've waited a long, long, long, long, long time for that, he told MUTV.
sent.trans: 近年来饱受伤病苦恼的挪威射手替补出场，帮助曼联在山谷球场3-0完胜对手。
